name: LumiLab
description:
LumiLab is an interactive mix of simulation and exhibition prototype that lets the player explore a world with amazing visuals and interactive objects based on lights, sounds, and non-euclidean illusions.

The prototype made with Unity 2020.3.32f1 under High Definition Pipeline (HDRP)

Tools:

  • Engine: Unity 2020.3.32f1
  • Programming Language: C#
  • 3D Modeling: Autodesk Maya
  • Documentation: Visual Studio Code, Adobe InDesign

Made by Mark and Samuel
